custom_nodes.author: Saganaki22
custom_nodes.title: Maya1 TTS
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node for Maya1 TTS - Expressive voice generation with 20+ emotions, voice design, and SNAC neural codec

custom_nodes.author: dskjal
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-yolov8-dsuksampler
custom_nodes.description: This node performs detection and segmentation, as well as upsampling, sampling, and blurring the composite.

custom_nodes.author: gitcapoom
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI FOV Estimator
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that estimates the Field of View (FOV) and tilt angle (horizon angle) of images using computer vision techniques.

custom_nodes.author: DazzleNodes
custom_nodes.title: DazzleNodes Collection
custom_nodes.description: A curated collection of image/latent creation and transformation custom nodes for ComfyUI. Each node is independently developed and maintained, but packaged together for convenient installation.

custom_nodes.author: nour
custom_nodes.title: nd-super-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Super LoRA Loader and ND Super Selector overlays for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ChronoEdit_SM
custom_nodes.description: Towards Temporal Reasoning for Image Editing and World Simulation,you can use this node in comfyUI,and Vram >12G

custom_nodes.author: GuardSkill
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VoiceSep
custom_nodes.description: Seperation the voice to 2 track/person by voicesep, keep the office effect in Modelscope demo meanwhile accelerate the resample speed.

custom_nodes.author: TJ16th
custom_nodes.title: TJ_PolkaDot
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for creating polka dot collages

custom_nodes.author: Lavah000
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Advanced Generation Pack (AGP)
custom_nodes.description: Production-ready custom nodes for advanced diffusion workflows. Modular implementation grounded in proven techniques from leading ComfyUI repositories.

custom_nodes.author: razvanmatei-sf
custom_nodes.title: Dynamic Prompt List Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to create lists of prompts with dynamic input count. Add or remove prompt inputs on the fly without creating multiple nodes.

custom_nodes.author: Elldreth
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI T5X Prompt Translator
custom_nodes.description: Translates natural language prompts into WD14-tagged prompts

custom_nodes.author: PauldeLavallaz
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CartesiaTTS
custom_nodes.description: Node for Cartesia Sonic-3 that calls the `/tts/bytes` endpoint and returns: file_path, bytes, url

custom_nodes.author: eddyhhlure1Eddy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EddySevenResonance
custom_nodes.description: lucky_seed

custom_nodes.author: trunksn1
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Checkpoint Rotation Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that enables automatic checkpoint rotation during batch image generation. This allows you to generate images using multiple different model checkpoints in a single workflow, automatically switching between them based on your specified interval.

custom_nodes.author: francarl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OnDemand-Lora-Loader
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to download and apply LoRA models directly from Civitai/HuggingFace. It simplifies your workflow by managing LoRA downloads automatically, so you don't have to manually download files and place them in the correct folder.

custom_nodes.author: Seb-Lis
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-image-labeler
custom_nodes.description: Image labeler for ComyUI

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-DreamOmni2
custom_nodes.description: ntage-DreamOmni2 brings Qwen2.5-VL’s multimodal intelligence to ComfyUI, enabling unified text–image understanding for both generation and editing. Create context-aware prompts, perform reference-based visual edits, and build adaptive image grids — all with high consistency, abstraction, and creative control.

custom_nodes.author: kianxyzw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Model Linker Extension
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that helps users relink missing models in workflows

custom_nodes.author: edoardocompagnucci
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HSyn9DHPE
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for 9D Human Pose Estimation, integrating the [a/HSyn9DHPE](https://github.com/edoardocompagnucci/HSyn9DHPE) project.

custom_nodes.author: dskjal
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-yolov8-simple
custom_nodes.description: Simple yolov8 comfyui plugin. This plugin adds Yolov8DetectionSegmentation node and ImageCompositeBlurred node.

custom_nodes.author: WingeD123
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_QwenVL_PromptCaption
custom_nodes.description: Leverages Qwen 2.5/3 VL for prompt inversion & caption generation.

custom_nodes.author: Amir Ferdos (ArchAi3d)
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GRAG-ArchAi3D
custom_nodes.description: Advanced GRAG (Guided Region-Adaptive Guidance) implementation for ComfyUI. Features: Simple Controller (3 parameters) for beginners, Unified Controller (25+ parameters) for experts, Advanced Sampler with v2.2.1 contamination fix, Preset Manager with 54 curated presets, per-layer control, adaptive schedules, and multi-resolution support.

custom_nodes.author: okdalto
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WithAnyone
custom_nodes.description:
This repository is a ComfyUI port of the WithAnyone model introduced in the paper.
[a/WithAnyone: Towards Controllable and ID-Consistent Image Generation (2025)](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.14975)
Original implementation: [a/Doby-Xu/WithAnyone](https://github.com/Doby-Xu/WithAnyone).

custom_nodes.author: hw5511
custom_nodes.title: Woohee HF Upscaler Loader
custom_nodes.description: Load upscale models directly from Hugging Face Hub in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Darth-Veitcher
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ollama Model Manager
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for managing [a/Ollama](https://ollama.com/) models in ComfyUI workflows. Load and unload models on-demand to optimize memory usage in constrained environments.

custom_nodes.author: DazzleNodes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Fit Mask to Image
custom_nodes.description: Automatically resizes masks to match image dimensions for seamless inpainting workflows.

custom_nodes.author: filliptm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_FL-Path-Animator
custom_nodes.description: A standalone ComfyUI custom node for creating animated shapes that follow user-drawn paths.

custom_nodes.author: vsaan212
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Subject Selector
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI_subjectselector is a custom ComfyUI node that allows you to manage and select text-based subject descriptions directly from the workflow UI. This node was designed to pair seamlessly with [a/ComfyUI-textsplit](https://github.com/vsaan212/Comfy-ui-textsplit), providing a clean, modular way to feed descriptive text prompts into your generation pipeline.

custom_nodes.author: walke2019
custom_nodes.title: Qwen2.5-VL GGUF Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for running GGUF quantized Qwen2.5-VL models using llama.cpp

custom_nodes.author: pizurny
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AV-Handles
custom_nodes.description:
Audio/Video handle management for ComfyUI workflows
Add and remove stabilization frames with synchronized audio for video diffusion models.

custom_nodes.author: tritant
custom_nodes.title: SuperScaler
custom_nodes.description: An all-in-one, multi-pass generative upscaling and post-processing node designed to simplify complex workflows and add a professional finish to your images.

custom_nodes.author: EuphoricPenguin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Resemble Enhance
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for audio enhancement using Resemble AI's Resemble Enhance model. Created using OpenHands, Cline, and DeepSeek.

custom_nodes.author: Rathius-Saranoth
custom_nodes.title: Rathius ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI by Rathius

custom_nodes.author: MartinDeanMoriarty
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NumberToText
custom_nodes.description: Converts a number (e.g., 2 or 15) into written text (e.g., two or fifteen). Works for english and german up to numbers as high as 9999 without problems.

custom_nodes.author: vantagewithai
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-DyPE
custom_nodes.description: Vantage DyPE integrates DyPE (Dynamic Position Extrapolation) into ComfyUI, enabling Flux-based transformer models to produce native ultra-high-resolution images (4K, 8K, and beyond) without retraining or external upscaling.

custom_nodes.author: Starnodes2024
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Star DyPE
custom_nodes.description:
Dynamic Position Extrapolation for Ultra High Resolution FLUX Image Generation
This custom node enables FLUX models in ComfyUI to generate ultra-high resolution images (4K and beyond) using DyPE (Dynamic Position Extrapolation) technology.

custom_nodes.author: ardadmrknn
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt History Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that automatically saves your prompts, generated images, and workflow metadata into a browsable history, accessible directly from the node.

custom_nodes.author: wizdroid
custom_nodes.title: Wizdroid Character Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that provide AI-powered prompt generation tools using Ollama. These nodes help create detailed, professional prompts for text-to-image generation across various domains including character creation, fashion, fantasy scenes, and image analysis.

custom_nodes.author: fuselayer
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-minimal-workflow-image
custom_nodes.description: Fixed implementation of the export workflow image utility from [a/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts](https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts). All nodes should display and all node links should be visible and render 1:1 to their actual states in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: fchangjun
custom_nodes.title: BaiduMeux_Comfy Tools
custom_nodes.description: Meux ComfyTools is a collection of custom nodes that streamline common workflow chores in ComfyUI for the Meux asset platform.

custom_nodes.author: HM-RunningHub
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_RH_VideoAsPrompt
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates Video-As-Prompt for motion-guided video generation from image inputs.

custom_nodes.author: SquirrelRat
custom_nodes.title: WanVideoLooper
custom_nodes.description: This is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI designed for generating sequential long video clips based on the Wan 2.2 model architecture, handling continuity between segments and offering advanced control over the sampling process

custom_nodes.author: FranckyB
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Prompt-Manager
custom_nodes.description: A simple custom node for ComfyUI that allows you to save and reuse prompts, organized into different categories

custom_nodes.author: Revmagi
custom_nodes.title: DDM Bundle - ComfyUI Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Clean workflow routing nodes for ComfyUI. Say goodbye to spaghetti connections!

custom_nodes.author: GreenLandisaLie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RichText_BasicDynamicPrompts
custom_nodes.description: Basic Dynamic Prompts functionality with a Rich Text texbox for coloring.

custom_nodes.author: spacepxl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VAE-Utils
custom_nodes.description: Nodes for loading and using VAEs in ways not supported by base ComfyUI. Currently supports Wan upscale VAE, more may be added later as needed.

custom_nodes.author: myonmu0
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Jumper
custom_nodes.description: Pass string and images between multiple ComfyUI via socket. Easy and intuitive nodes for remote connection.

custom_nodes.author: alFrame
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI AF - Find Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that allows you to find and locate nodes by their ID, title, pack, or type in complex workflows.

custom_nodes.author: alFrame
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI AF - Pack-Prompt-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight suite of ComfyUI custom nodes for AI prompt management and history tracking.

custom_nodes.author: hardik-uppal
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QwenVL-MultiImage
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node that integrates Qwen2.5-VL and Qwen3-VL vision-language models with multi-image support. Process multiple images simultaneously with advanced AI capabilities for image understanding, comparison, and analysis.

custom_nodes.author: loockluo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI WhisperX Pro
custom_nodes.description: A professional ComfyUI custom node for accurate text-audio alignment using [a/WhisperX](https://github.com/m-bain/whisperX).

custom_nodes.author: fchangjun
custom_nodes.title: Baidu Meux ComfyTools
custom_nodes.description: Baidu Meux ComfyTools is a collection of custom nodes that streamline common workflow chores in ComfyUI for the Baidu Meux asset platform.

custom_nodes.author: petr-pr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TranslationNode
custom_nodes.description: Offline translation node for ComfyUI, powered by Facebook's M2M-100 multilingual model. Translate text between 100+ languages — completely offline and private.

custom_nodes.author: flybirdxx
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SoulX-Podcast
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-SoulX-Podcast is a custom node plugin for ComfyUI that packages the core functionality of SoulX-Podcast (long-form, multi-speaker, multi-dialect podcast voice generation) into a visual node workflow.

custom_nodes.author: eRepublik-Labs
custom_nodes.title: ERPK Collection
custom_nodes.description: A monorepo for ERPK's custom ComfyUI nodes, extending ComfyUI's functionality through integrations with various AI services and APIs.

custom_nodes.author: weekii
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GGUF-FX
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for running GGUF quantized Qwen2.5-VL models using llama.cpp

custom_nodes.author: nomadoor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Video Stabilizer
custom_nodes.description: Two complementary stabiliser nodes for ComfyUI: Video Stabilizer (Classic), Video Stabilizer (Flow)

custom_nodes.author: wouterverweirder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PenPlotter
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes to convert images to pen plotter files

custom_nodes.author: iGavroche
custom_nodes.title: RocM Ninodes
custom_nodes.description: ROCM Optimized Nodes for ComfyUI - High-performance VAE decode and sampling nodes specifically tuned for AMD GPUs with ROCm support, particularly targeting gfx1151 architecture

custom_nodes.author: Aishor
custom_nodes.title: Meta-Sampler Guiado (Seed-WAN)
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI node that implements the Guided Meta-Sampler for video outpainting.

custom_nodes.author: ModelTC
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LightVAE
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LightVAE is a collection of LightX2V VAE custom nodes designed for ComfyUI, supporting high-performance video VAE models including LightVAE and LightTAE.

custom_nodes.author: koirpraw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI GCP Cloud Storage Integration
custom_nodes.description: This custom node package provides seamless integration between ComfyUI and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Cloud Storage, enabling you to run ComfyUI without relying on instance disk storage. decouple your storage needs from local disks by leveraging GCP's scalable and reliable Cloud Storage service. Models can be saved and loaded directly from Cloud Storage, while outputs and temporary files are automatically synced.

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DyPE
custom_nodes.description: DyPE for FLUX. Artifact-free 4K+ image generation.

custom_nodes.author: yeeyou
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenAI Compatible API Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that supports OpenAI-compatible APIs, allowing it to call any large-language-model service compatible with the OpenAI API format (such as vLLM, LM Studio, Ollama, LocalAI, etc.).

custom_nodes.author: heyburns
custom_nodes.title: Image Chooser Classic
custom_nodes.description: A modern re-implementation of the classic [a/cg-image-picker](https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-image-picker) ComfyUI nodes. Keep the workflow-pausing image selection experience while shedding the legacy compatibility shims.

custom_nodes.author: ussoewwin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QwenImageLoraLoader
custom_nodes.description: Standalone ComfyUI custom node for Nunchaku QwenImage LoRA loading functionality.

custom_nodes.author: rsxdalv
custom_nodes.title: TTS WebUI API nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: TTS WebUI Kokoro, TTS WebUI Chatterbox, TTS WebUI StyleTTS2, TTS WebUI Kitten TTS, TTS WebUI F5-TTS, TTS WebUI Preset
Add API key to environment variable 'TTS_WEBUI_OPENAI_API_KEY'
Alternatively you can write your API key to file 'tts_api_key.txt'
You can also use and/or override the above by entering your API key in the 'api_key' field of each node.

custom_nodes.author: djdarcy
custom_nodes.title: Smart Resolution Calculator
custom_nodes.description: Flexible resolution and latent generation for ComfyUI with toggle-based dimension inputs and automatic calculation of missing values

custom_nodes.author: yannickcruz
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YSC HighRes-Fix
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI designed to simplify the 'High-Resolution Fix' process. This node takes an input image, performs a direct upscale, and then re-encodes it into a latent image, preparing it for a final sampling pass to add details.

custom_nodes.author: GeekatplayStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI HiTem3D Integration
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI node collection that integrates with the HiTem3D API to generate high-quality 3D models from images, featuring advanced HTML preview capabilities and dynamic content generation.

custom_nodes.author: abdullahceylan
custom_nodes.title: AC Image Optimizer
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node for optimizing and compressing images with support for multiple formats (JPEG, WebP, PNG) and configurable quality settings.

custom_nodes.author: Windecay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CheckVprediction
custom_nodes.description: A simple node for detecting vrediction, outputs a boolean value, used for logical switching (for example, automatically adding rescalecfg when vrediction model is detected), recommended to be used with if else and other nodes.

custom_nodes.author: eddyhhlure1Eddy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TorchCompileSpeed
custom_nodes.description: Standalone torch.compile optimization node for ComfyUI with speed-focused presets

custom_nodes.author: Fossiel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Fossiel-QoL-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Fossiel-QoL-Nodes is (what will hopefully become) a suite of custom nodes for ComfyUI to improve quality of life. These nodes have been developed for personal use but maybe you’ll find them useful as well.

custom_nodes.author: Dehypnotic
custom_nodes.title: Dehypnotic Save nodes
custom_nodes.description: Save toolkit for audio, image, and video: MP3 audio export with VBR/CBR options, multi-format image saving with workflow/thumbnail metadata, and video + frame encoding (MP4/MKV/WEBM/MOV) — all sharing whitelist-safe paths and rich placeholder templating.

custom_nodes.author: Blacksnowskill
custom_nodes.title: BSS WD14 Batch Tagger
custom_nodes.description: Automatic image tagging using WD14 models with batch processing and GPU acceleration for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Novice_Chen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Simple-IndexTTs
custom_nodes.description: Bilibili IndexTTS2 ComfyUI Version - Auto-downloads models, simple to use.
